ingredients.ingredient: 2 (3 ounce) packages enoki mushrooms, coarsely chopped
1 small carrot, peeled and very finely chopped
2 pinches ground white pepper, or to taste
1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed

cookingTips: Chop enoki mushrooms coarsely to distribute throughout patties evenly
Whisk eggs well and fold in vegetables gently to maintain texture
Cook patties over medium heat until set on bottom, then flip carefully to avoid breaking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These savory patties combine vegetables with eggs. How should you mix the batter to ensure even vegetable distribution and proper cooking?
